description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Microsoft AllJoyn API information disclosure vulnerability (CVE-2024-38257):

1. Download and apply the latest updates corresponding to your Windows version from the official Microsoft Update catalog.
2. Ensure that Windows is up to date by checking Windows Update settings and installing all pending updates.
3. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update resolves the use of uninitialized resources which could lead to information disclosure.
- For manual installation, download the update packages from:
  - [KB5043076](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043076)
  - [KB5043067](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043067)
  - [KB5043064](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043064).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is one of the affected versions before proceeding with the installation of updates.
- Backup critical data before applying any updates to avoid potential data loss.
